targets.expr: sum by(container, pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$Namespace", container!="", image!="", container!="POD"})/sum by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$Namespace"})>0.85

sum by (container, pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", namespace="$Namespace"}[2m]))/sum by(container, pod) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$Namespace"})> 0.85
sum(sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu"}) by (node) + sum(kube_node_spec_unschedulable==0) by(node)) or on() vector(0)

count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false", namespace="$Namespace"}==1) by(namespace) - (count(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded", namespace="$Namespace"}==1) by(namespace) or vector(0)) or count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false", namespace="$Namespace"}==1) by(namespace)
sum(sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory"}) by (node) + sum(kube_node_spec_unschedulable==0) by(node)) or on() vector(0)

sum(sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{namespace="$Namespace"}) and group by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{phase="Bound", namespace="$Namespace"} == 1)) or on() vector(0)
